front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Immersive Visual Content Coding
front.abstract: IEEE 1857.9 is working on the standard which provides efficient coding tool sets for compression, decompression, and reconstructing of the immersive visual content data. The target applications and services include but are not limited to virtual reality such as unmanned aerial vehicle-based VR, augment reality, panorama video, free-view TV, panoramic stereo video, and other video/audio-enabled services and applications such as immersive video streaming, broadcasting, storage and communication.
